abstract: Yahoo said Monday that it was buying Zimbra, a start-up that provides Web-based e-mail to businesses and institutions, as it seeks to extend the reach of its popular e-mail service and better compete with Google.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo said Monday that it was buying Zimbra, a start-up that provides Web-based e-mail to businesses and institutions, as it seeks to extend the reach of its popular e-mail service and better compete with Google.

headline.main: Yahoo to Buy Business E-Mail Service
